requests.name: add article 1
requests.rawModeData:
{
  "token":"{{token}}",
    "title": "水电费",
    "it_service": ["{{service_email_uuid}}"],
    "tag": ["测试","随机"],
  "author": "随机",
  "ref_links": ["https://www.baidu.com/"],
  "tasks": "测试插入",
  "type":"Troubleshooting",
  "content":{"description": "水电费", "analysis": "水电费", "solution":"前几天，我的邻居小伙伴突然在QQ上问我突然在不，她比我大几岁，平日里交集不算太多，这么冷不丁的来一句“在吗？”，让我误以为是骗子又来实施诈骗了","workaround": "水电费"}
 }

tests["discussions found"] = jsonData.data.count == 1
